page.title: 15PRE_SCHOOL ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are two{playgroups}in Usk:one in the Baptist Chapel the other in a small playgroup near the school.The latter playgroup has 38 children on the register.The playgroup is open 9.15-12.15 and it is open Monday to Friday every week.The children have many activities such as painting,sand pit,playing with water and free play.There are two supervisors and usually two mothers help.The playgroup was opened in January 1982. 20 years before in 1962 the first playgroups were started.We asked the children what games they like to use most.They said:Dressing up,Playing on toy cars,painting and playing with bricks. All but one of the children are looking forward to coming to the {Infant school. { .
